description: [Status: stable] [Name: pytest-unnecessary-asyncio-mark-on-fixture] [Message: pytest.mark.asyncio is unnecessary for fixtures] What it does Checks for unnecessary @pytest.mark.asyncio decorators applied to fixtures. Why is this bad? pytest.mark.asyncio is unnecessary for fixtures. Example import pytest @pytest.mark.asyncio() @pytest.fixture() async def my_fixture(): return 0 Use instead: import pytest @pytest.fixture() async def my_fixture(): return 0
